name: Incredible
css: /* Typography */ body { color: #EDEDED !important; } h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 { color: #FFFFFF !important; } .prose, .mdx-prose { line-height: 1.7 !important; letter-spacing: .01em; max-width: 900px; } .prose h1, .prose h2, .prose h3, .mdx-prose h1, .mdx-prose h2, .mdx-prose h3 { margin-top: 2rem; margin-bottom: .75rem; } .prose p, .prose li, .mdx-prose p, .mdx-prose li { margin: .5rem 0; } code, pre { font-size: 0.95rem !important; } code:not(pre code) { background: rgba(255,98,0,.08); padding: 0 .3rem; border-radius: 6px; } /* Cards */ .card, .Card_root__ { border-radius: 14px !important; transition: all .2s ease; background: rgba(255,255,255,0.02); } .card:hover, .Card_root__:hover { border-color: #FF6200 !important; box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #FF6200 inset !important; transform: translateY(-1px); } /* Code blocks */ pre { background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(255,98,0,0.08), rgba(255,98,0,0.03)) !important; border: 1px solid rgba(255,98,0,0.15) !important; border-radius: 12px !important; } /* Tables */ table { width: 100%; border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 0; } thead th { position: sticky; top: 0; background: rgba(255,255,255,.06); } tbody tr:nth-child(odd) { background: rgba(255,255,255,.02); } td, th { padding: .6rem .75rem; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.08); } /* Callouts */ .callout, .Callout_root__ { border-left: 3px solid #FF6200; background: rgba(255,98,0,.07) !important; } /* TOC sticky */ aside[aria-label*='Table of contents' i], .table-of-contents, .toc { position: sticky; top: 84px; max-height: calc(100vh - 100px); overflow: auto; } /* Search */ input[type='search'] { border-radius: 10px; } /* Light mode tweaks */ @media (prefers-color-scheme: light) { body { color: #222 !important; } .prose, .mdx-prose, p, li, div { color: #333 !important; } pre { background: #f7f7f9 !important; border-color: #e6e6ea !important; } } /* Hide mintlify branding */ footer a[href*='mintlify']{display:none!important;} footer [aria-label*='Mintlify']{display:none!important;} footer [alt*='Mintlify']{display:none!important;} footer [data-testid*='powered']{display:none!important;} footer .powered-by, footer .poweredBy, footer .mintlify-powered-by{display:none!important;} footer *:has(> a[href*='mintlify']){display:none!important;}
